titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the Right Honourable, the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and the Common Councel of the City of London, Iune. 10. By His Excellencie T. Fairfax. O. Crumwell T. Hammond H. Ireton T. Rainsborough H. Waller. [brace] N. Rich. R. Hammond R. Lilburn, T. Pride, T. Hewson. I. Disborow.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Whittington at the blew Anchor in Corne-hill, neere the royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, line 4 of title reads: "To the Right Honourable, the Lord".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the blew Anchor in Corne-hill, neere the royall Exchange.
